DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study determine safety efficacy orbital injection LIPO-102 .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Determine Safety Efficacy Orbital Injections LIPO-102 Patients With Symptomatic Exophthalmos Associated With Thyroid-related Eye Disease ( TED )
DOC.criteria: Male Non pregnant female Symptomatic exophthalmos Inactive Thyroid Eye Disease Signed informed consent Known hypersensitivity study drug Treatment investigational agent within 30 day first dose History Thyroid Eye Disease le 6 month Previous decompression surgery Glaucoma
